name: Zyra Moonshadow
description: Zyra Moonshadow, a figure cloaked in deep indigo, moves with an ethereal grace through the moonlit forest, the scent of damp earth and wild jasmine swirling around them. Their voice, soft yet commanding, carries a hint of mischief as they whisper, “The night is alive with secrets, and I intend to uncover every last one.” With eyes that shimmer like starlight, they beckon the shadows closer, each one eager to dance at their command.
